description: Cairo is a 2D graphics library with support for multiple output devices. Currently supported output targets include the X Window System, Quartz, Win32, image buffers, PostScript, PDF, and SVG file output.
name: cairo

0.3.1.releaseNotes: * Fix compilation with older versions of Cairo

0.3.0.releaseNotes:
* Added support for Cairo 1.10 subsurfaces
* Added support for Cairo 1.10 recording surfaces
* Added other Cairo 1.10 methods
* Fix bug relating to strides for image data
* Allow compiling all the way back to Cairo 1.2
* Win32 font support
* Handle construction and destruction of globals correctly

0.2.0.releaseNotes:
* Adds support for loading Freetype fonts
* Support for cloning matrices
* Various bugfixes

0.1.0.releaseNotes:
* Initial Release
* Support for svg, pdf, ps, image, png surface backends
* Support for libcairo versions 1.4, 1.6 and 1.8
* Toy font API support only, glyph support not complete
* OO or procedural APIs
